meanings.definition: A type of cigarette originating from Indonesia, typically made with a blend of tobacco and cloves.
meanings.sent1: I tried a kretek for the first time and enjoyed the unique flavor.
meanings.sent2: In Indonesia, many people enjoy smoking kretek cigarettes.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone was curious about the kretek I was smoking.
meanings.sent4: The scent of kretek lingered in the air, creating a cozy atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The colorful packaging of kretek caught my eye in the store.

meanings.definition: To smoke or consume kretek cigarettes.
meanings.sent1: He decided to kretek with his friends during the break.
meanings.sent2: After a long day, she likes to relax by kreteking on the balcony.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed fascinated by the smoke as he watched her kretek.
meanings.sent4: She kreteks slowly, savoring each puff of the aromatic cigarette.
meanings.sent5: The room filled with the sweet smell of her kreteking, creating a cozy ambiance.
